name: Super Strawberry
description: Strawberry infused frosting with a Superman logo embossed on top. Totally not licensed by DC Comics.

name: Double Chocolate
description: Milk chocolate and dog chocolate all mixed in one, because you probably can't spot the dog chocolate amongst all that sugar.

name: Apple Crumble
description: It's just a regular cupcake, but we serve it on top of old iPhones and charge four times the price.

name: Good for Muffin
description: This isn't really a cupcake, Linda, so don't put this one on the menu.

name: Quintuple Chocolate
description: Dark chocolate, milk chocolate, white chocolate, and chocolate from the 4th dimension combine in one cupcake. Only joking â€“ it's just dog chocolate again.
